alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Hardeman; Haywood; Madison (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 10:30AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Fayette, northern Hardeman, southeastern Haywood and southwestern Madison Counties through 1100 AM CDT... At 1030 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Somerville, or 16 miles southwest of Bolivar, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bolivar, Chickasaw State Forest, Whiteville, Somerville, Silerton, Lagrange, Hillville, Cloverport, Mercer, Williston, Toone, Grand Junction, La Grange, Hickory Valley, Pine Top, Uptonville, Teague, Pattersonville, Leighton and Van Buren. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
